§ Charlotte Elizabeth Krempo

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Charlotte Elizabeth Krempo** is an alternative spelling of **Charlotte Elizabeth Krempowiecki**.

**Charlotte**, her sister **Violet**, and her brother **Charles** sometimes had their family-name shortened to **Krempo**.
